biotools.summary: MOLS 2.0 is a free and open-source software package for Peptide Modeling and Protein-Ligand Induced-Fit Docking developed in Prof. N. Gautham's Lab at the Centre of Advanced Study in Crystallography and Biophysics, University of Madras, Tamil Nadu, India.

bioschemas.name: MOLS 2.0
